f2639.value: Oceanteam Solutions is an independent oﬀshore cable-services provider. With an asset-base of carousels, loading towers, tensioners and other ancillary equipment as well as a large team of competent cable handling crew, Oceanteam Solutions supports the marine cable industry with a variety of services such as short- and long-haul cable transport, cable storage and handling on a global basis.

f2649.value: Oceanteam has an oﬀice in Velsen-Noord, the Netherlands. The corporate headquarters is in Baerum, Norway.
